knowledgeGraph.title: Sharp Grossmont Hospital
knowledgeGraph.description: Sharp Grossmont Hospital is a 524-bed hospital in La Mesa, California, United States. It opened in 1955.

attributes.Address: 5555 Grossmont Center Dr, La Mesa, CA 91942

organic.title: Sharp Grossmont Hospital
organic.snippet: With 524 beds, our hospital offers a variety of services — from advanced cancer care to orthopedic surgery, labor and delivery to emergency care. And we're here ...

organic.title: Sharp HealthCare: Top San Diego Hospitals and Doctors
organic.snippet: Sharp HealthCare is San Diego's health care leader with hospitals in San Diego, affiliated medical groups, urgent care centers and a health plan.

organic.title: Sharp Grossmont Hospital Emergency Room
organic.snippet: Sharp Grossmont's emergency room is available 24 hours a day and serves East County communities such as El Cajon, La Mesa and Santee.

organic.title: SharpCare Grossmont
organic.snippet: Sharp HealthCare is San Diego's health care leader with hospitals in San Diego, affiliated medical groups, urgent care centers and a health plan.

organic.title: Sharp Grossmont Hospital for Women & Newborns
organic.snippet: From mothers and their infants to comprehensive gynecologic care throughout a women's life, we are the name you can trust in East County.
